short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check prices for digital product all around the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The MyTems24 Addon provides anybody a great overview off any games prices and offers of many different stores. 
When visiting any Game-Seller-Site, the addon compares all prices and tells you the exact fees for paypal and debit card. You are able to see filter the region and platform to get you the most fitting results as user of the Addon. As an extra feature on steam, you are able to see the amount of active players (steamcharts), how often the game got purchased (steamspy) and the average 100% playthrough time (howlongtobeat). You will be notified, when the game you are looking for requires a different launcher such as DRM for example social club for GTA V.
As a user, you are able to report any game, in case the price is not right, or the game is not available anymore, to naturally improve the Addon. You will also be informed, if there is any discount-code available for the game you are looking for. The notification for the coupon is shown on the checkout site. You are able customize your Addon by being able to turn off and on any additional information or specific shops you are not interested in. 
The Addon does not save any private information, the information is saved in the users browser. All in all, the Addon is a tool to get a great overview over specific games you are interested in, while browsing through your favorite shops. 
Our goal is it to help gaming-interested people finding themselves the most fitting deal. We do wanted to give the user the opportunity to customize anything he wants to only see shops and data he is interested in, to stop information overflow. Built in referral links are embedded as the Addon is free to use for anybody. This way our developer are able to improve the Addon on a daily base.
